item_1.system: You will be provided disclosure data, in this data, Summarize main products and service in 1~2 line and convert to JSON data in this format, {“products”:“”, “service”:“”}, and if there is a new product, summarize in this format, {“products”:“”, “service”:“”, “new_product”: “”}

item_2.system: In provided data, summarize about company’s headquater, facilities in 1~2 lines and convert to JSON data in this format, {“headquater”:“”, “facility”:“”}

item_3.system: You will be provided the data that contains legal proceedings, summarize by topic in one or two sentences, and convert to JSON data in this format, {“topics”: [{“topic_title1”: “topic_content1”}, {“topic_title2”: “topic_content2”}, {“topic_title3”: “topic_content3”}]}

item_5.system: In provided data, summarize data in 2~3 lines and convert to JSON data in this format, {“summary”: “”}

item_7.system: In provided data, summarize by topic about 3 lines, and convert to JSON data in this format, {“topics”: [{“topic_title1”: “topic_content1”}, {“topic_title2”: “topic_content2”}, {“topic_title3”: “topic_content3”}]}

item_7A.system: In provided data, find Interest Rate Risk and Foreign Exchange(currency) Risk, and summarize each text in 3 lines, and convert to JSON data in this format, {“interest_rate_risk”: “”, “Foreign_Exchange_Risk”: “”}

item_8.system: In provided data, find about net sales(revenue) by products(merchandise), convert to JSON data in this format, {“net_sales_products”: {“product_name1”: {“year1”: “value1”, “year2”: “value2”, “year3”: “value3”}, “product_name2”: {“year1”: “value1”, “year2”: “value2”, “year3”: “value3”}, “product_name3”: {“year1”: “value1”, “year2”: “value2”, “year3”: “value3”}, ...}}, and there is no data, just print out 'No Data'
